_description: A nonsense carol, six unrhymed quatrains with ‘downe downe downe’ burden

TokyoTak51.First Lines:
Robyn hudde in bernsdale stode he leynyd hym tyll a maple
                    thystyThen came owr lady and swete seynt Andrew slepes thow wake thow
                    geffrey coke…
TokyoTak51.Last Lines:
…Who dar be so harde daredAs to Cack vnder the water of
                    dover
TokyoTak51.Facsimiles:
Holt,  J. C.,  and  T. Takamiya.  
             “A New Version of ‘A Rhyme of Robin Hood’.” 
             English Manuscript Studies 1100-1700
         1 (1989): 213-21.

Holt,  J. C.,  and  T. Takamiya.
